titles.title: Teacher Tax Reduction Act of 2011
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the deduction for certain expenses of elementary and secondary school teachers to $500 and to extend it through 2013.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/5/2011--Introduced. Teacher Tax Reduction Act of 2011 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase from $250 to $500 the dollar limit on the tax deduction for certain expenses of elementary and secondary school teachers and to extend such deduction through 2013.
